roadmaps.title: Frontend Developer
roadmaps.description: Crafts responsive user interfaces and engaging web experiences using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks to bring designs to life in the browser.

roadmaps.title: Backend Developer
roadmaps.description: Builds and maintains server-side applications, handles data storage, and creates APIs to power web applications with focus on security and performance.

roadmaps.title: Fullstack Developer
roadmaps.description: Masters both frontend and backend development to create complete web applications, from user interfaces to server architecture.

roadmaps.title: DevOps Engineer
roadmaps.description: Automates deployment processes, manages cloud infrastructure, and ensures smooth collaboration between development and operations teams.

roadmaps.title: Cloud Engineer
roadmaps.description: Designs, implements, and manages cloud-based solutions using platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.

roadmaps.title: Data Scientist
roadmaps.description: Analyzes complex data sets to help organizations make data-driven decisions using statistics, machine learning, and programming.

roadmaps.title: UI/UX Designer
roadmaps.description: Creates intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces while ensuring excellent user experience through research and testing.

roadmaps.title: Mobile Developer
roadmaps.description: Develops applications for mobile devices using platforms like React Native, Flutter, or native Android/iOS development.

roadmaps.title: Blockchain Developer
roadmaps.description: Creates decentralized applications and smart contracts using blockchain technologies like Ethereum and Solidity.

roadmaps.title: Game Developer
roadmaps.description: Develops video games using engines like Unity or Unreal, combining programming skills with creative design.

roadmaps.title: AI/ML Engineer
roadmaps.description: Develops artificial intelligence and machine learning models to solve complex problems and automate tasks.

roadmaps.title: Security Engineer
roadmaps.description: Protects systems and networks from cyber threats, implementing security measures and conducting vulnerability assessments.

roadmaps.title: QA Engineer
roadmaps.description: Ensures software quality through systematic testing, automation, and establishing quality assurance processes.

roadmaps.title: DB Administrator
roadmaps.description: Manages and optimizes database systems, ensuring data integrity, security, and high performance.

roadmaps.title: Technical Manager
roadmaps.description: Bridges technical and business aspects, leading product development while understanding both user needs and technical constraints.
